message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I'm willing to give you a 16.7% discount from the market value of $1200000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you buy it now, I'll throw in a free inspection report to confirm its quality.
